title: Skills
subtitle: The knowledge i have acquired
description: This are some of the skills i have acquired over the years throught self-learning, education and working experience. I am always looking to learn new technologies and improve my skills but this are the ones i consider myself proficient in.

skill1.title: Angular
skill1.subtitle: Front-end framework
skill1.description: I know how to use Angular to create single-page applications using HTML and TypeScript. Some of the concepts i am familiar with are components, services, routing, forms, signals, and dependency injection. As an example, this website was built using Angular.

skill2.title: Spring Boot
skill2.subtitle: Java
skill2.description: Spring Boot is an open source Java-based framework used to create micro-services.

skill3.title: Angular
skill3.subtitle: Java
skill3.description: Angular is a platform and framework for building single-page client applications using HTML and TypeScript.
